notes.text:
This update for xmlbeans fixes the following issues:

  - CVE-2021-23926: Fixed XML parsers not protecting from malicious XML input (bsc#1180915).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The XML parsers used by XMLBeans up to version 2.6.0 did not set the properties needed to protect the user from malicious XML input. Vulnerabilities include possibilities for XML Entity Expansion attacks. Affects XMLBeans up to and including v2.6.0.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
